A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m a die hard fan since seeing the original Star Wars in 1978. The Last Jedi will never live up to anything like A new hope. But I thoroughly enjoyed it\, so different from what I had expected and so much fun to watch even in its long running time. I understand that TLJ is not going to please all Star Wars fans fans. But in my opinion it was great\, I loved it
